sentence.Network_en: The role of Boreal forest biome in climate change has been investigated through the BOREAS experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过BOREAS实验,我们研究了北部森林植物群落对气候变化所起的作用.

sentence.Network_en: BRDF measurements were obtained by POLDER on various supersites in the South area of the BOREAS.
sentence.Network_cn: 在BOREAS的南部地区,POLDER获取了各种实验场地上的BRDF测量值.

sentence.Network_en: When Boreas blows, you are horrified and cough, catch cold and shock.
sentence.Network_cn: 北风起时, 惊骇的你一声咳嗽, 感冒休克.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油英语词汇(B4)--石油百科 ... Borealis 北方贝属 boreas 北风 Boreaspis 北甲鱼属.

list.abs: ...北虫疠霉（学名：Pandora borea）是属于虫霉目虫霉科虫疠霉属的一种真菌，寄生在蝇类上。该种分布于中国。cite book|title=《中国真菌志·第十三卷：虫霉目》|editor=李增智|publisher=科学出版社|year=2000.
